statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); parent=$(dirname "$cwd"); folder=$(basename "$cwd"); git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); status=$(git -C "$cwd" status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$status" ]; then git_info=" ($branch*)"; else git_info=" ($branch)"; fi; fi; node_info=""; if [ -f "$cwd/package.json" ] && command -v node >/dev/null 2>&1; then node_version=$(node --version 2>/dev/null | sed 's/v//'); node_info=" â¬¢ $node_version"; fi; printf "\033[2m%s/\033[0m%s%s%s | %s" "$(basename "$parent")" "$folder" "$git_info" "$node_info" "$model"
